definition: that part of the central nervous system that includes all the higher nervous centers, to kill by smashing someone's skull
details:
noun
- that part of the central nervous system that includes all the higher nervous centers
= synonyms: encephalon
- that which is responsible for one's thoughts and feelings
= synonyms: head
- mental ability
= example: mental ability
= synonyms: brainpower, learning ability, mental capacity, mentality, wit
- the brain of certain animals used as meat
- someone who has exceptional intellectual ability and originality
= synonyms: genius, mastermind, brainiac
verb
- to kill by smashing someone's skull
= example: to kill by smashing someone's skull
- to hit on the head
= example: to hit on the head
